nodes.text: The Esh-kha Tactical Center was a Rakatan vault located in the Warlord's Deep in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. During the invasion of Belsavis, the Esh-kha species took over the vault and converted it into a tactical command center.
The Esh-kha Tactical Center appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Imperial mission "Ancient Transmissions."
